title.narrative: Building Relation through Intercultural Dialog III

description.narrative: Building Relationship through Intercultural Dialogue and Growing Engagement - BRIDGE Program (Phase II and III) is an important part of Australia's support to Education Sector in Indonesia. It builds people to people links between Australian and Indonesia teachers and students and improves communication through global learning and new technology, through Australia - Indonesia sister schools arrangements. BRIDGE II and III builds upon the success of BRIDGE, which has provided benefit to over 100,000 students in Australia and Indonesia. These partnerships foster a better understanding and knowledge about Indonesia in Australia schools. Through BRIDGE II and III, Australia will support new partnerships reaching Australian and Indonesian teachers, and connecting students in both countries through Skype, school visits, and on-line lessons.
